name: VG_Billing_Report
query: SELECT so.name AS Order_No, tvbo.name AS "Billing_no:Link/VG_Billing_Order:100", so.order_type AS Order_Type, (CASE WHEN aso.approve = "Approve" THEN 'Approve' WHEN aso.approve = "Check" THEN 'Check' WHEN aso.approve = "Cancel" THEN 'Cancel' WHEN aso.approve = "Sample Pending" THEN 'Sample Pending' ELSE "Inprocess" END) AS Approve, so.cust_name AS Cus_Name, so.contact_number AS Mobile_No, bm.branch_name AS Branch_name, im.item_name AS Item_Name, so.sales_person AS Salesman, so.delivery_date AS Delivery_Date FROM `tabVG_Customer_Order` so LEFT JOIN `tabVG_Approve_Order` aso ON aso.order_no = so.name LEFT JOIN `tabBranch_Master` bm ON bm.name = so.branch_name LEFT JOIN `tabItem_Master` im ON im.name = so.prod_name LEFT JOIN `tabVG_Billing_Order` tvbo ON so.name = tvbo.name WHERE aso.approve IS NULL OR aso.approve NOT IN ("Approve", "Check", "Cancel", "Sample Pending")
